item.description:
When: Tuesday, December 7th from 7:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m.
Where: Mantra
52 Temple Place
Boston MA 02111
Website and Register: http://www.biotechtue... or $20 at the door

Biotech Tuesday is a premier monthly networking event for those in the Biotech Industry that has been around since 2002. It is strictly networking with an average monthly turnout of around 150-200 people. Venues are held at different locations each month throughout the Greater Boston Area. Individuals or companies who may have questions or interest in sponsoring future events, please contact Josh Lang at lang.josh@yahoo.com.
item.name: Biotech Tuesday - Networking Event
